data.actual_result: Bot Tag either gets cut off and show nothing else, or cut off and have the part of the tag to go into a new line.
data.expected_result: Bot Tag should be showed fully.
data.short_description: Bots with long usernames have the bot tag cut off (or have part of the bot tag to go into a new line) in Mini Profile
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a bot where you can change username, or find one yourself. (A bot with a playing status would work the best.)- Change the bot's username to something long (i.e. ~ DiscordTestersStream or DiscordTestersTesting) - Click on their profile to view their mini-profile. - Observe.
